info.description:
Bookingmotor-api is an api that manages hotel reservations in different parts of the world. It allows generating lists of hotels an destinations, availability booking, creation bookings, getting lists of bookings, making cancellations and obtaining booking information.

## Workflow 

![bookProcesREst](https://bookingmotor.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/API/API+Rest+book+process.jpg)
![gestionUsuarios](https://bookingmotor.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/API/gestiondeusuarios.png)
info.title: Bookingmotor-API

name.description: Name of the country in the supported languages

en.example: This award-winning Atascadero hotel is host to the Central Coast wine region with access to winery and vineyard tours, wine tasting and annual wine festivals as well as championship golf courses, biking and hiking trails, and the world-renown Hearst Castle. The Best Western Plus Colony Inn in Atascadero is located in the heart of San Luis Obispo County. This Rider-Friendly hotel provides easy access to Highway 101 and is minutes to historic downtown Atascadero. Guests are near culinary attractions, wineries, restaurants, specialty shops, the Pacific Ocean, Pismo Beach, Morro Bay Harbor, Paso Robles Wine Country, and more! The Best Western Plus Colony Inn is a wonderful destination for weekenders and business travelers. This newly renovated hotel features a welcoming lobby, a well-appointed business center, seasonally heated pool and Jetted spa, and a fully appointed fitness center. Complimentary high-speed Internet, Large HD televisions with HD programming and free movie channels are available in all guest rooms as well as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee/tea maker, iron and ironing board. A complimentary hot breakfast buffet is served daily to our hotel guests which includes scrambled eggs, breakfast meats, bagels and cream cheese, made-to-order waffles, assorted Danish and muffins, yogurt, oatmeal, cold cereals, fresh fruit juices, coffee, tea, hot chocolate and more! Atascadero, CA is home to the Charles Paddock Zoo, Atascadero Lake and Lake Pavilion, and Chalk Mountain Golf Course. Nearby, guests can enjoy an abundance of recreational activities including two lakes for fishing, boating and water sports, three historic Missions, biking, hiking and year-around wine and food festivals.

checkIn.title: Initial date for availability
checkIn.description: Format: `Y-m-d`, min: now and less than `checkOut`

children.description: If the passenger is a child, the age must be specified

administration.example: Once the payment of the booking is confirmed, there will be a fee of (USD) 25, in case of cancellation, without prejudice to any cancellation charges applied by the operator as its general conditions

considerations.example: In the case of cancel, early departure, no show and/or modify this book the value charged by the supplier can be up to 100% depending on the policy of each supplier or hotel
